main.name: Alex Abram
main.description: I work with Relatient, based in Franklin, Tennessee. We are passionate about assisting healthcare organizations with state of the art patient-centered engagement.
main.bio: With an education in full-stack development, I am looking to further strengthen my ETL skill set within the realm of healthcare technology.
main.contactmessage: Want to get in contact with me directly? Feel free to reach out via my cell, email, or the form below.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience working with the following languages:

education.description: Attended Bootcamp to enhance skills and puruse a job in engineering at the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic. Full time 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programmin skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.
Graduated with a degree in philosophy in order to master problem-solving and critical thinking skills.

work.title: ETL Engineer/Integration Specialist
work.description: Led initiative in transferring 150+ existing clients from a legacy SFTP environment to AWS Transfer Family. This includes creating AWS accounts, client outreach, connecting clients to new SFTP endpoint, adding code to integrate new endpoint, QA, and continual client support.

work.title: VP of Leasing and Sales
work.description: Lead clients through the leasing and/or purchase process while utilizing CRE softwares such as CoStar.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Assisted the special servicing department with the management of REO assets. Analyzed figures and generated hold/sale reports using Excel.

projects.title: CineSearch
projects.category: A random movie generato designed to cut down on the time it takes for users to search for which movie to watch.

projects.title: Pro Quest
projects.category: A functional task manager that turns assignment tracking into a game.

projects.title: Eat Da Burger
projects.category: A burger logger using MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and a freshly cooked ORM.

projects.title: Employee Summary Generator
projects.category: A CLI that generates an employee/team summary based on user input.

projects.title: Password Generator

testimonials.text: Every problem has a solution. You just have to be creative enough to find it.
